controller.application

Class BaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.application.BaseController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Authentication, CountryCreate, GenreCreate, GetCountryList, GetGenreList, GetKeywordList, GetLanguageList, KeywordCreate, StationCreate, StationGetActive, StationGetPageable, Welcome

    public class BaseController
extends Object
    this class is designed to be extended in any controller.
    all the controllers should extend this class.
    if you want to use GenericMessage getters this class must be inject with @Autowired
    Author:
    skuarch
